to.shell_command: yabai -m space --layout $(yabai -m query --spaces --space | jq -r 'if .type == "bsp" then "float" else "bsp" end')
yabai -m window west --resize right:-40:0 2> /dev/null || yabai -m window --resize right:-40:0
yabai -m window east --resize left:40:0 2> /dev/null || yabai -m window --resize left:40:0
yabai -m window --space next && yabai -m space --focus next
yabai -m window --space prev && yabai -m space --focus prev
osascript -e 'display notification "Fullscreen Stack Layout" with title "Yabai"'

rules.description: Double tap `left_shift` key to enable capslock
Double tap `right_shift` key to switch input setting
